item.title: About
item.description: My experience spans across quantitative strategy development and investment banking, including internships at SDIC Securities, where I built and tested systematic futures trading strategies and supported IPO due diligence. At Shepherd Ventures, I’ve contributed to building robust “Black Swan–resilient” portfolios using clustering and optimization models. I’ve actively engaged with the Capital Management Club, where I analyzed equity strategies and participated in stock pitch competitions. Beyond my technical work, I served as President of the Chinese Students and Scholars Association, where I led major cultural and sponsorship initiatives.
